name: The Fractures in Your Mind
description:
In a world where we project our persona on many different social platforms we could loose our sense of self. Our identity ends up fractured in all the selfies and posts that mirror who we are without really reflecting ourselves.

The game is non linear, you can get different texts at the end. It was made for the A Game By Its Cover Jam based on the design by Starsky (@starrrsky) that you can find below.
